summary: A color scheme based on DarkTango specially for Python editing
name: kib_darktango.vim
description:
The color scheme I use to edit all my Python files. 
It is more or less based on DarkTango color scheme.

Some users told me it was nice with PHP files as well, but I haven't tested with other files than Python and Ruby.

A screenshot is here :
http://kib2.free.fr/documents/Vim/vim_kib_dark_tango.png

All comments are welcome.
